lead_paragraph: LOW--Marjorie, (nee Winograd), on March 28, 2016 at age 98. Beloved wife of the late Arthur. Devoted mother of Peter (Peggy), and the late Babette Low Lintz (Alan). Cherished grandmother of Amy Chasen (David) and John Low (Donna). Loving great-grandmother of Carly and Halle Chasen and Alexis and Zachary Low. A courageous woman who fought for life until the very end. Services private. 1/3
